title: Memorials for 2 Young Women Killed in Iran Galvanize Protests
description: For a second day in a row, tens of thousands of demonstrators protested across Iran against the country’s authoritarian clerical rule. The government response on Thursday was again deadly.
dc:creator: Farnaz Fassihi and Cora Engelbrecht
media:description: A video distributed on social media on Wednesday showing people marching toward the cemetery where Mahsa Amini, who died after being detained by Iran’s morality police, is buried.
